Miles Sound System SDK 6.6h

Q:

How do I set an EAX reverb room style?

A:

In the 2D system, use the AIL_set_digital_master_room_type to set the appropriate global reverb values first, and then use AIL_set_sample_reverb_levels to bring the wet level up.

In the 3D system, use the AIL_set_3D_room_type to set the EAX room first, and then call AIL_set_3D_sample_effects_level to turn the effects volume up for the 3D samples that should have reverb.
